attributes.action: ban teacher training days in school time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it that teachers feel the need to have training days x ammount of times a year ...they have 3 plus months off a year...Surely teachers could use their extended holidays to train...every time teachers have training days we the parents are expected to take time off work

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
